description_for_human: Sweep native gas tokens to exactly zero across 25+ EVM chains.
description_for_model: ZeroDust sweeps 100% of native gas tokens (ETH, BNB, POL, etc.) from any supported EVM chain, leaving exactly zero balance. Funds are sent to any address on the same or a different chain. Use this to check balances across chains, get sweep quotes, and execute sweeps. Supports Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base, Optimism, Polygon, BSC, and 20+ more EVM chains.
